title: NLCS: How the Phillies Decided to Travel Home Early
description: Despite a recommendation to stay the night in San Diego on Wednesday, Philadelphiaâ€™s road-weary players elected to get home as quickly as possible. So far, so good.
dc:creator: Scott Miller
media:description: The Philadelphia Phillies appeared well-rested when Kyle Schwarber led off with a 405-foot home run on Friday in Game 3 of the National League Championship Series.
